member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.IBlogSearchResponse.PublishedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the published date (rfc-822 format) of the blog post referenced by this search result.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.IImageSearchResponse.Height

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.IImageSearchResponse.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets a brief snippet of information from the page associated with the search result

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.IImageSearchResponse.ContentNoFormatting
member.summary: Gets or sets the same information as .content only stripped of HTML formatting.

member.name: T:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse
member.summary: Defines the public interface for a local search result.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title for the result.

remarks.para: In some cases, the title and the streetAddress are the same.
This typically occurs when the search term is a street address such as 1231 Lisa Lane, Los Altos, CA.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.TitleNoFormatting
member.summary: Gets or sets the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets a url to a Google Maps Details page associated with the search result

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.Coordinates
member.summary: Gets or sets the coordinates of the result.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.StreetAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the street address and number for the given result.
member.remarks: Note:, in some cases, this property may be set to "" if the result has no known street address. address line.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.City
member.summary: Gets or sets the city name for the result.
member.remarks: Note:, in some cases, this property may be set to "".

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.Region
member.summary: Gets or sets a region name for the result.

remarks.para: In the us, this is typically a state abbreviation, in other regions it might be a province, etc.
Note:, in some cases, this property may be set to "".

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.Country
member.summary: Gets or sets a country name for the result.
member.remarks: Note:, in some cases, this property may be set to "".

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.PhoneNumbers
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of phone number objects.

remarks.para: Each object contains a .type property and a .number property.
The value of the .type property can me one of "main", "fax", "mobile", "data", or "".

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.DirectionsUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a url that can be used to provide driving directions from the center of the set of search results to this search result.
member.remarks: Note, in some cases this property may be missing or null. Always wrap access within a a test of if (result.ddUrl && result.ddUrl != null)

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.DirectionsUrlToHere
member.summary: Gets or sets a url that can be used to provide driving directions from a user specified location to this search result.
member.remarks: Note, in some cases this property may be missing or null. Always wrap access within a a test of if (result.ddUrlToHere && result.ddUrlToHere != null)

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.DirectionsUrlFromHere
member.summary: Gets or sets a url that can be used to provide driving directions from this search result to a user specified location.
member.remarks: Note, in some cases this property may be missing or null. Always wrap access within a a test of if (result.ddUrlFromHere && result.ddUrlFromHere != null)

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.StaticMapUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a url to a static map image representation of the current result.
member.remarks: The image is 150px wide by 100px tall with a single marker representing the current location. Expected usage is to hyperlink this image using the url property. The image may be resized using GlocalSearchgoogle.search.LocalSearch.resizeStaticMapUrl(). The Static Map Tile sample demonstrates one way to use this property.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.ListingType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of listing
member.remarks: This property indicates the type of this result which can either be "local" in the case of a local business listing or geocode result, or "kml" in the case of a KML listing.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.ILocalSearchResponse.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets a content snippet associated with the result
member.remarks: For "kml" results, this property contains a content snippet associated with the KML result. For "local" results, this property is the empty string.

member.name: T:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse
member.summary: Defines the public interface for a news search result.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the news story returned as a search result

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse.TitleNoFormatting
member.summary: Gets or sets the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse.UnescapedUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw URL of the result

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets an escaped version of the above URL

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse.ClusterUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a URL to a set of related stories.
member.remarks: When a news result has a set of related stories, this URL is available and non-null. In this situation, the URL points to a landing page that points to all of the related stories.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets a snippet of content from the news story associated with this search result.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse.Publisher
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the publisher of the news story.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the news story.
member.remarks: This is a list of locations in most specific to least specific order where the components are seperated by ",". Note, there may only be one element in the list... A typical value for this property is "Edinburgh,Scotland,UK" or possibly "USA".

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse.PublishedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the published date (rfc-822 format) of the news story referenced by this search result.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.INewsSearchResponse.RelatedStories
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of related stories.
member.remarks: This property is optional. It only appears in a result when the story also has a set of closely related stories. In this case, the relatedStories[] array will be present.

member.name: P:Reimers.Core.Google.Search.IWebSearchResult.CacheUrl
member.summary: Supplies a url to google's cached version of the page responsible for producting this result. This property may be null indicating that there is no cache, and it might be out of date in cases where the search result has been saved and in the mean time, the cache has gone stale. For best results, this property should not be persisted.
